item.title: Jennifer Lawrence to Receive San Sebastian Film Festival’s Donostia Award
item.description: The actress’ latest film, the Cannes-premiering ‘Die, My Love’ with Robert Pattinson, will also premiere at the Donostia Award Screening at the Spanish film festival.

item.title: Saoirse Ronan-Starring ‘Bad Apples’ to Open New Directors Strand at San Sebastian Film Festival
item.description: The Spanish film fest will also present the feature-length debut of the BBC’s ‘Mood’ creator Stroma Cairns as well as Yukari Sakamoto’s ‘White Flowers and Fruits’, set to close the section.
